heading: Sensual like the night.
subheading: The air conditioner is a design accessory. Discover the unique style of the powerful Naitec Onyx air conditioner. Its elegant dark design will become a luxurious addition to your interior, while its modern features, including integrated Wi-Fi, ensure maximum comfort and easy control.
why_info_item_1_description: It won't let you down even on the coldest days, this powerful system ensures comfort and warmth in every season. Efficient heating and minimal energy costs.
why_info_item_2_description: The UVC lamp eliminates bacteria and viruses, contributing to a healthier and safer environment in your home.
why_info_item_3_description: Control the air conditioner via Wi-Fi allows you to easily set the temperature, modes, and other functions via your smartphone or tablet from anywhere, anytime.
why_info_item_4_description: With a noise level of only 22 decibels, it is one of the quietest air conditioners on the market. You can be sure of undisturbed summer evenings in the pleasant environment of your home.
why_info_item_5_description: The high energy efficiency of refrigerant R32 ensures more efficient cooling and heating by the air conditioner, significantly reducing the environmental impact. It is the ideal choice for a sustainable future.
all_you_need_item_1_description: Naitec Onyx automatically cleans its internal evaporator with sterilization to keep your air fresh, free of bacteria and viruses.
all_you_need_item_1_long_description: When the “sterilization” function is activated, the evaporator in the indoor unit first freezes and then heats up to 57°C, which, in combination with the UVC lamp, ensures the cleaning of the internal unit and the destruction of pathogenic bacteria. This technology adds a pleasant feeling of freshness to your home and provides a healthy atmosphere without unnecessary negative effects.
all_you_need_item_2_title: Heating with the air conditioner down to -25°C
all_you_need_item_2_description: The ability to efficiently heat down to -25°C ensures a comfortable and pleasant environment even during colder winter days.
all_you_need_item_3_description: We focus on quality, so Naitec Onyx comes with a 3-year warranty, ensuring long-term reliability.
all_you_need_item_3_long_description: The extended warranty is only valid with regular servicing at least once a year with the supplier from whom you purchased the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_4_description: Optional voice controller Lisa for easy and convenient air conditioner control by voice.
all_you_need_item_5_description: In the app, you can set a performance limit for the air conditioner, allowing you to save up to 70% energy.
effective_heating_description_1: Naitec air conditioners are very efficient at heating.
effective_heating_description_2: It is so powerful that it can easily heat down to -35°C. Effective heating and minimal energy costs without the need for other heat sources.
